creator: Sony Mobile Communications
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Advagym, your guide to smarter training! A gym with the Advagym solution allows you to log your workout automatically. No pen and paper, no manual input needed. It automatically counts repetitions and sets in real time, and displays a full overview of each training session. And it’s easy. Just tap on the puck with your smartphone to log in to each machine.

Structured training means better gains
The Advagym app displays previous results for each machine and exercise. This helps you work out in a structured way and get more out of the time you spend in the gym. Since repetitions and sets are logged automatically, you can focus 100% on your exercises.

Add your favorite workouts
In addition to the predefined programs Advagym comes with, you can get your own personal programs from the gym you're connected to. You can also easily save your own workout as your personal program. All your training history is saved making it easier for you to follow your progress over time and reach your fitness goal faster.

Free weights and cardio, too
Automatic logging in Advagym is for gym machines. For free weights and cardio training you simply add your results manually and the training history is displayed in the same way as the exercises that are logged automatically.

Availability
Advagym is a concept from Sony and is currently available in a limited number of gyms. The service may be suspended or closed at any time.

This application uses analytics software to collect and aggregate statistics to help us improve this app and our services. None of this data can be used to identify you.​

https://advagymsolutions.com/
descriptionShort: Advagym will make it easier to keep track of your workouts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Added support for gyms to be able to send out invitations in social media and/or by email. If clicked you will automatically become a member at that gym when the apps starts. Issue with some Android phones resolved.

https://advagymsolutions.com/
descriptionShort: Advagym will make it easier to keep track of your workouts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Your programs are now split into 3 tabs for easy access; programs from your gym, your person trainer and your own. They can also be sorted in different ways to make it easy to find what you are looking for. Exercise history has also been made more visible and accessible so you can track your progress even better during a workout.

descriptionShort: Advagym will make it easier to keep track of your workouts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Your PT or gym can now send you text messages, comments on your workout, pictures, links to videos and more. All will be organized for easy access in the new Message Inbox where you can manage all your messages and invites.

appDetails.developerAddress: Shinagawa Seaside TS Tower, 4-12-3, Higashi-shinagawa, Shinagawa-ku, Tokyo, 140-0002, Japan
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Notifications have been added e.g. you won't miss out when your PT or gym updates your programs or send you a message. There is now a countdown timer for duration based exercises so no need to use an external timer anymore.

appDetails.developerAddress: Shinagawa Seaside TS Tower, 4-12-3, Higashi-shinagawa, Shinagawa-ku, Tokyo, 140-0002, Japan
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New program UI where the gym can sort their programs in categories making them more visible and easier to find. The gym can turn on Gym popular times showing their users when and how much the gym equipment is used. This let the user to be able to go to the gym but still keep social distancing by selecting time slots with low activity.

descriptionShort: Advagym will make it easier to keep track of your workouts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Advagym now supports several new types of connected cardio machines. Tap a puck or select a connected exercise in the exercise list to connect to compatible connected cardio machines and get the data from the machine in your workout.
Bugfixes.

descriptionShort: Advagym will make it easier to keep track of your workouts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Possible to add automatic progression to your programs where you have exercises with weight goal. Your achievements are now also visible in your workout history. Customise your user profile by adding a profile picture. A wide range of FTMS compatible cardio machines are now supported.
Stability and UI fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Introducing the Real time graph, showing your stroke tempo and range in real time when using a compatible machine. Note! This feature is in beta and needs to be activated by the gym AND in the app.

All your training history is saved making it easier for you to follow your progress over time and reach your fitness goal faster.

Free weights and cardio, too
Automatic logging in Advagym is for gym machines. For free weights and cardio training you simply add your results manually and the training history is displayed in the same way as the exercises that are logged automatically.

Availability
Advagym is a concept from Sony and is currently available in a limited number of gyms. The service may be suspended or closed at any time.

This application uses analytics software to collect and aggregate statistics to help us improve this app and our services. None of this data can be used to identify you.​
descriptionShort: Advagym will make it easier to keep track of your workouts

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Google sign in added as a log in option. The real time guide can now be calibrated manually in order to get a consistent calibration. Rep events are now handled even when the app is minimised. Shortcut for adding your results now added, press the green box for current set.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The Real time guide now works on a wider range of phones and has been improved overall. Also added support for more FTMS cardio machines. UI improvements, specially when handling incoming messages and instruction videos. Stability and UI fixes.
